grope.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to try to find something that you cannot see by feeling with your hands
grope.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Ginny groped for her glasses on the bedside table.
We groped around in the darkness.
grope.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to go somewhere by feeling the way with your hands because you cannot see
grope.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Ally groped steadily towards the door.
I was groping my way blindly through the trees.
grope.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: to move your hands over someone’s body to get sexual pleasure, especially when they do not want you to do this
grope.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: touching someone’s body to get sexual pleasure, especially when they do not want you to do this
